column2: PAPA BEAR THIS IS ALPHA BLACK. WE HAVE SEARCHED ALL THE AREA, NO RUSSIANS LEFT. AREA IS CLEAR. ALPHA OUT.
ALPHA BLACK TO ANY STRIKE AIRCRAFT. WE HAVE ENEMY TANK IN GRID COORDINATES INDIGO ALPHA NINER SEVEN. REQUESTING CLOSE AIR SUPPORT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS ALPHA. WE HAVE FOUND SOME SORT OF ENEMY AMMO CACHE. DO YOU WANT THEM DESTROYED. OVER.
ALPHA THIS IS CHARLIE. WE COPY YOU GOT TARGET FOR US. ON OUR WAY, THAT TANK IS HISTORY, HE JUST DONT KNOW IT YET. OVER.
CHARLIE TO ALPHA. YOU GOT ONE DEAD TANK OVERTHERE. THANK YOU FOR YOUR COOPERATION. CHARLIE OUT.
ROGER THAT ALPHA. MAKE THEM DISAPPEAR. PAPA BEAR OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. GOOD WORK. OVER.
